channel.title: Issues on Technical Committee of Polish Olympiad in Informatics

item.title: [Resolved] Szkopu≈Ç: Maintenance
item.description: There has been planned downtime in order to deploy new version of the software.
item.content: There has been planned downtime in order to deploy new version of the software.

item.title: Email contact required for MAIN2 signups
item.description: Due to technical reasons we have disabled signups on MAIN2. If you still need an account, send an email to olimpiada@oi.edu.pl including your first and last name, email address and preferred username. We apologize for the difficulties.
item.content: Due to technical reasons we have disabled signups on MAIN2. If you still need an account, send an email to olimpiada@oi.edu.pl including your first and last name, email address and preferred username. We apologize for the difficulties.
